Package cryptoTrader.utils

Class DataFetcher

java.lang.Object
cryptoTrader.utils.DataFetcher
public class DataFetcher extends Object
This class is used to fetch data from the cryptoCoin web site

  • Method Details

    • getDataForCrypto

      private com.google.gson.JsonObject getDataForCrypto(String id, String date)
      create a private get method to fetch the data from the given website
      Parameters:
      id - Giving cryptoCoins id
      date - Giving real date to be further stored into the database
      Returns:
      return the stored data. Throw the exception when data cannot be fetched from the website

    • getPriceForCoin

      public double getPriceForCoin(String id, String date)
      This method is used to get the price for cryptoCoins
      Parameters:
      id - Give the cryptoCoin id to locate
      date - Give the real date
      Returns:
      return the price obtained from the web site

    • getMarketCapForCoin

      public double getMarketCapForCoin(String id, String date)
      This method is used to get the market capitalization
      Parameters:
      id - Give the cryptoCoin id to locate
      date - Give the real time date
      Returns:
      return the market capitalization for the 'cad' value

    • getVolumeForCoin

      public double getVolumeForCoin(String id, String date)
      This method is used to get the volume of the cryptoCoins
      Parameters:
      id - Give the cryptoCoin id to locate
      date - Give the date
      Returns:
      return the cryptoCoin volumes in cad

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main method to call the data fetcher method given several cryptoCoin id and date
      Parameters:
      args - return the price, market capitalization and volume for requested cryptoCoin
